messages.title: Let's Make a Difference
messages.content: As a Glasgow councilor since 2006, Billy has worked tirelessly to rid the city of organised crime, corruption and council mismanagement. With over 20 years of community activism behind him, he's on Glasgow's side.

messages.title: INDEPENDENCE
messages.content: North East Glasgow needs independence. We need the freedom to manage our economy, restore East Glasgow to great working again and the freedom to release Glasgow's potential. North East Glasgow should be relieved of organised crime. We need clear and rigorous reinvocations of council funds, to cut services, to restore Glasgow values without fear or favour.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pledges crime cut, 100% extra police in Glasgow, action to stop alcohol at pocket-money prices.
Promises new hospitals and schools for Glasgow, and record investment in affordable housing.
World-leading climate-change bill. Strong support for renewable energy.

issues.economy: Pledges to manage the economy to restore East Glasgow to great working again.
issues.education: New hospitals and schools for Glasgow.
issues.environment: World-leading climate-change bill. Strong support for renewable energy.
issues.governance: Billy has worked tirelessly to rid the city of organised crime, corruption and council mismanagement.

leaflet.personalStatement: I promise to represent all constituents equally, to buy and to operate an open and consultable constituency office. I promise not to employ any family member and will always vote to protect Glasgow from cuts.

politicalExperience.achievements: Rid the city of organised crime, corruption and council mismanagement.

socialMedia.facebook: Billy McAllister for Glasgow North East

endorsements.endorsement: Backing local outsider against city chambers.

quotes.text: "I support independence, and I support the people of Scotland to make that decision."

The SNP was founded in Glasgow and Glasgow is central to our vision of a fairer, more successful Scotland. We're certain that Glasgow's strong tradition of hard work, innovation, enterprise and ambition can deliver prosperity and bring new jobs.

leaflet.additionalNotes: For further points on Labour's shortcomings and SNP's stance on Glasgow-specific issues, references to 'SNP Standing up for Glasgow' and 'Labour Letting Glasgow Down'.
